description: Developing the Airtel Transmission System and creating an inventory data storage pipeline for Airtel. Responsible for detecting configuration changes and building dashboards for model training.

Passionate and experienced GDSC Lead with a proven track record of organizing and leading successful tech events and initiatives. Proven ability to motivate and inspire others, as well as to build and manage high-performing teams. Expertise in software development and a strong interest in emerging technologies.

I completed my Content Writer Internship at Papersdrop! It was a great experience where I learned about various new technologies and developed essential skills.With the help and support of our papersdrop team, I publish 7 Blogs throughout this internship.
